name: 4 Lynx 4
overview: Based on the Connect 4 board game, this is a game by Amphru Destiny for up to 4 players. This version has a scoring system built into it. The grid is made up of different shapes, and when a player gets four in a row, they are awarded score depending on which shapes make up the four in a row. It also has an anti-gravity feature which can lead to some interesting play.
